  • Method Details

    • setAddDropWindow

      void setAddDropWindow(boolean open)
      Sets the add/drop window status in the system settings.
      Parameters:
      open - true if the window should be opened, false otherwise.

    • addProfessor

      Integer addProfessor(String username, String professorName, String role, String password, String department, String designation)
      Adds a new professor to the system.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the professor.
      professorName - The name of the professor.
      role - The role of the professor.
      password - The password for the professor's account.
      department - The department of the professor.
      designation - The designation of the professor.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added professor, or -1 if the operation failed.

    • printUnapprovedStudents

      boolean printUnapprovedStudents()
      Prints the IDs of all unapproved students.
      Returns:
      true if there are unapproved students, false otherwise.

    • approveOneStudent

      void approveOneStudent(Integer student_id)
      Approves a student by their ID.
      Parameters:
      student_id - The ID of the student to approve.

    • approveAllUnapprovedStudents

      void approveAllUnapprovedStudents(Boolean choice)
      Approves all unapproved students if the given choice is true.
      Parameters:
      choice - If true, all unapproved students are approved.

    • addCourse

      void addCourse(String course_id, String course_name, Boolean isOffered)
      Adds a new course to the system.
      Parameters:
      course_id - The ID of the course.
      course_name - The name of the course.
      isOffered - Whether the course is offered or not.

    • showAllProfs

      void showAllProfs()
      Displays all professors in the system.

    • showAllCourses

      void showAllCourses()
      Displays all courses in the system.

    • removeProf

      void removeProf(Integer instructor_id)
      Removes a professor by their ID.
      Parameters:
      instructor_id - The ID of the professor to remove.

    • removeCourse

      void removeCourse(String course_id)
      Removes a course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      course_id - The ID of the course to remove.

    • viewApprovedStudents

      void viewApprovedStudents()
      Displays all approved students in the system.

    • isCourseExists

      boolean isCourseExists(String courseId)
      Checks if a course exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to check.
      Returns:
      true if the course exists, false otherwise.
